name: King Air Academy
about: King Air Academy is a premier flight training institution specializing in King Air aircraft. We offer comprehensive Initial and Recurrent training programs, designed for both professional pilots and owner pilots, with a focus on insurance-approved certification. Our training is based on the procedures and techniques outlined by Tom Clements, and each new student receives an electronic copy of "The King Air Book â€“ Volume 1." We utilize a variety of static and motion simulators, as well as in-aircraft training, to provide realistic and safe learning environments. Additional services include Pre-Purchase Flight Evaluations and Post Maintenance Acceptance Flights to ensure aircraft readiness. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art simulators ensure that pilots receive the highest quality training, making King Air Academy a trusted name in aviation education.
